ProjectTitle: Self-other distinction in borderline personality disorder: Integrating behavioral and neuroscientific approaches
InitialFeedbackHistory: 13/06/2024 Preservation/Sharing: Please note that RDR is used share data and preserve it at the same time, but not for preservation only, the same dataset can be published once, in RDR or in OSF with only one DOI. [REDACTED] data is fully anonymous you can use OSF, but if there may still be a small risk that others may identify subjects you can use RDR and apply access restrictions, you can transfer your data from OSF to RDR via the integration dashboard: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/integration-dashboard. 13/06/2024 Preservation/Sharing: Please note that RDR is used share data and preserve it at the same time, but not for preservation only, the same dataset can be published once, in RDR or in OSF with only one DOI.
